content.rendered: Pindurai Makufa has an MSc in Public Health from Anglia Ruskin University, Chelmsford, UK and a Master of Arts in Migration and Law from Queen Mary, University of London, Westfield College, A Bachelor of Arts from University of Sierra Leone and a Post Graduate Certificate of Education. Pindurai Makufa is an Associate Lecturer at Regent College London with responsibilities to facilitate and assessing learning in the School of Allied Health in the BSc (Hons) in Health and Social Care with Foundation.
